TermDefinition.DefinitionText: A type of internal radiation therapy in which radioactive material sealed in needles, seeds, wires, or catheters is placed directly into a tumor or body tissue.

MediaLink.alt: Pronunciation of dictionary term "interstitial radiation therapy"

SpanishTermDefinition.DefinitionText: Tipo de radioterapia interna en la que se coloca un material radiactivo sellado en agujas, semillas cables o cat√©teres directamente en un tumor o tejido corporal.
